alert.note: Alert for Pierce; St. Croix (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 10:19PM CDT until further notice by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Wisconsin and Minnesota... St Croix River at Stillwater affecting Pierce, Washington and St. Croix Counties. .The combination of snow melt runoff and forecast rainfall will continue to increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...St Croix River at Stillwater. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 90.0 feet, HWY 95 between Afton and Bayport begins to flood. Lakefront Park bathhouse in Hudson affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 900 PM CDT Friday, the stage was 85.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 89.9 feet early Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 87.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 89.7 feet on 04/14/1952. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
